game_state.last_scenario_text:
With rubble still cascading around you, you land gracefully within the shattered summoning circle, your boots crushing the scattered ritual components beneath them. The shadow entity writhes and begins to destabilize, its form flickering between dimensions as the broken circle fails to contain it, while the Lead Cultist shrieks in fury and raises a wicked curved dagger. Two remaining Cultist Acolytes emerge from behind fallen pillars, their eyes blazing with fanatical rage as they close in on your position.

**Choose your action:**

1. **Athletics Check (DC 14)** - Grab a large chunk of fallen masonry and hurl it at the Lead Cultist to knock them off balance before they can complete their attack

2. **Combat** - Draw your weapon and engage all enemies head-on (Lead Cultist [desperate], 2 Cultist Acolytes, unstable Shadow Entity)

3. **Arcana Check (DC 16)** - Attempt to use the disrupted magical energies from the broken circle to turn the destabilizing Shadow Entity against the cultists

4. **Intimidation Check (DC 15)** - Point to the collapsing shadow entity and shout warnings about the danger, trying to make the cultists flee in terror rather than fight
game_state.last_player_choice: 3. Combat - Stand your ground in the center of the disrupted circle and fight the enraged cultists who are now converging on your position (Lead Cultist [desperate], 2 Cultist Acolytes, destabilizing Shadow Entity)
